name: cupboard

A2 a piece of furniture or a space for storing things, with a door or doors and usually with shelves: a kitchen cupboard We keep the hoover and mop in a cupboard under the stairs. Is there plenty of cupboard space (= are there many cupboards) in your new house?
urfinguss/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
